sentences.sContent: Manning hoped to acquire valuable works of art as cheaply as possible.
sentences.sCn: 曼宁希望以尽可能低的价格买到有价值的艺术品。

sentences.sContent: She has acquired an email address and a site on the World Wide Web.
sentences.sCn: 她获得了一个电子邮件地址和万维网网址。

sentences.sContent: ...not only do we acquire knowledge but we learn how to communicate with people...
...Decades of research have shown that in order to acquire skills and real knowledge in school...
...immobile workers are less able to demand better wages or conditions or to acquire valuable skills...
...solve problems and acquire fascinating facts about the exciting world in which they live.26 Why do some children trapped in a burning building hide from masked fire fighters...

remMethod.val: ac ＋ quire(追求) → 不断寻求才能够获得 → 获得

words.tran: [医] 后天的；已获得的；已成习惯的

trans.tranCn: 取得， 获得， 学到
trans.tranOther: to obtain something by buying it or being given it
